title: Bug 10022: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
OB: The "Build" popup action is incorrectly enabled even when the build process is already completed.
EB: The "Build" popup action should only be enabled when the build process needs to be performed manually.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Verify that the build process has already been completed.
3. Observe that the "Build" popup action is still enabled.
4. The "Build" popup action should be disabled since there is no need for a manual build if the build is already done automatically.
